posts.post_title: B18 Blankets Tougher Purple Variation For Sale
posts.post_content:

Zack Wheat HOF (Green Infield)Vg-EX$30.00

Jim Viox (purple pennants)        VG-EX$30.00
Dee Walsh (purple basepaths)        NM        $50.00 SOLD
Dee Walsh (Purple basepaths)        EX        $30.00
Jimmy Austin (purple basebaths)        EX        $30.00 SOLD
Bill McAllister (purple basepaths)        NM        $50.00 SOLD

Price is delivered. Paypal okay. First email that says I will take it gets it!

Thanks for looking,

Joe

email sent on the austin, mcallister and the nicer walsh  
would like to see scans of the other two.
